title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: **Copilot Enhancements**: Added Playwright MCP server support and custom instruction fallbacks (CLAUDE.md, AGENTS.md).
**Documentation Warnings**: Warned about line ending conversion issues when uploading via web interface.
**UI Fix**: Corrected 'Expand All' behavior in site-wide Table of Contents.
**REST Docs**: Adjusted shortTitles for better alphabetical ordering.
**CodeQL Updates**: Introduced Rust language support (public preview) and updated unsupported languages list.
summary:

- **Documentation Warnings**: Warned about line ending conversion issues when uploading via web interface.
- **UI Fix**: Corrected 'Expand All' behavior in site-wide Table of Contents.
- **REST Docs**: Adjusted shortTitles for better alphabetical ordering.
- **CodeQL Updates**: Introduced Rust language support (public preview) and updated unsupported languages list.
generated_title: Add Playwright support to Copilot, enable CodeQL Rust preview, and fix ToC expansion
commits: **5681735**: [2025-07-02] Playwright and 3P custom instructions support for Copilot coding agent (#56444) (by Tim Rogers)
**eee4f71**: Add warning about line ending conversion (#56429) (by vaindil)
**d5b0b06**: Fix the 'Expand All' button in the all-site ToC (#56439) (by hubwriter)
**ee4b9c8**: Tidies up some shortTitles to fix alphabetical ordering in REST docs (#56443) (by Ben Ahmady)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- **Copilot Enhancements**: Added Playwright MCP server support and custom instruction fallbacks (CLAUDE.md, AGENTS.md).
- **Documentation Warnings**: Warned about line ending conversion issues when uploading via web interface.
- **UI Fix**: Corrected 'Expand All' behavior in site-wide Table of Contents.
- **REST Docs**: Adjusted shortTitles for better alphabetical ordering.
- **CodeQL Updates**: Introduced Rust language support (public preview) and updated unsupported languages list.

### Title
Add Playwright support to Copilot, enable CodeQL Rust preview, and fix ToC expansion
